trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de visual no tempo de design para controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> class provides the visual representation for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> classe fornece a representação visual de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> class and adds validation to verify that the associated control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or derived type.
trans-unit.target: Ele é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> classe e adiciona a validação para verificar se o controle associado é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle ou tipo derivado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> inherits a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property from its parent that is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> herda um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade de seu pai que é sempre definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: This causes the visual design environment to generate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to hold a temporary copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> on the design surface; this copy is then persisted into markup.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o ambiente de design visual gerar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle para manter uma cópia temporária do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> na superfície de design; essa cópia é então persistida na marcação.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to return `false`, the visual design environment generates markup directly from the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade para retornar `false`, o ambiente de design visual gera marcação diretamente do real <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts designers generally act much like regular control designers; the principal methods for setting design-time appearance derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Designers de partes da Web geralmente funcionam muito como designers de controle normal; os principais métodos para definir a aparência de tempo de design derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the design-time markup associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, você pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para alterar a marcação de tempo de design associada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: You can likewise override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods to handle errors and empty strings (""), respectively.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, você pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> métodos para tratar erros e cadeias de caracteres vazias (""), respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the interaction between a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra a interação entre um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle e seus associados <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control from which the end user selects his or her birthday, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to submit the selection, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to display a message on the user's birthday.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> controle a partir do qual o usuário final seleciona seu aniversário, um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> controle para enviar a seleção e um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle para exibir uma mensagem no aniversário do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> verifies that the associated control is of the expected type and then customizes the design-time rendering of said control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner> verifica se o controle associado é do tipo esperado e, em seguida, personaliza o processamento de tempo de design do controle tal.

trans-unit.source: Note that the visual customizations of the designer are visible only at design time, whereas those of the associated control are visible at both run time and design time.
trans-unit.target: Observe que as personalizações visual do designer são visíveis apenas em tempo de design, enquanto aquelas do controle associado são visíveis em tempo de execução e tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: All the methods overridden in this example derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos substituídos neste exemplo derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe base.

trans-unit.source: For other available members and their use, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para outros membros disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to a control and validates that the control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Associa o designer a um controle e valida que o controle é um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.
